comments.body: Skolemizationating! It'd be great to use this trait's comment to explain once and for all what skolem types are and what their purposes are. I'd be curious to know exactly how they're related to https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Skolem_normal_form too.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +15,19 @@ *  by surviving in a context or in GADT bounds. 
 */
trait Skolemization {
  
  implicit val ctx: Context
